actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide that rescue squad members are entitled to death benefits made available under such Act.

summary.text: Renders survivors of rescue squad members killed in the performance of duty eligible for public safety officer death benefits under the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Street Act of 1968.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide that rescue squad members are entitled to death benefits made available under such Act.
